member.name: F:DaLion.Harmonics.I18n.Keys.Dialogue_Emily_Gemstones_Second
member.summary: The unique key for a translation equivalent to "One time I tried packing a ring with a bunch of gemstones, to resonate with all of them at once.#$b#But it kept falling apart! member.name: M:DaLion.Harmonics.I18n.GetByKey(System.String,System.Object)
member.summary: Get a translation by its key.
member.param: The translation key.
An object containing token key/value pairs. This can be an anonymous object (like new { value = 42, name = "Cranberries" }), a dictionary, or a class instance.
member.remarks: You should usually use a strongly-typed method like instead.

member.name: T:NetEscapades.EnumGenerators.EnumExtensionsAttribute
member.summary: Add to enums to indicate that extension methods should be generated for the type

member.name: P:NetEscapades.EnumGenerators.EnumExtensionsAttribute.ExtensionClassNamespace
member.summary: The namespace to generate the extension class. If not provided the namespace of the enum will be used

member.name: P:NetEscapades.EnumGenerators.EnumExtensionsAttribute.ExtensionClassName
member.summary: The name to use for the extension class. If not provided, the enum name with "Extensions" will be used. For example for an Enum called StatusCodes, the default name will be StatusCodesExtensions
